name: MoPub-SnapAudienceNetwork-Adapters
summary: SnapAudienceNetwork Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial.

To download and integrate the SnapAudienceNetwork SDK, please check this tutorial: https://kit.snapchat.com/docs/ad-kit-ios. 


For inquiries and support, please utilize the support page: https://support.snapchat.com/en-US/co/snap-kit-contact/.
